BadgeDetail.Name: Independent Learning
BadgeDetail.Description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated they can learn independently. During induction they have demonstrated they can use in learning resources such as reading an article or blog post, listen to a podcast or watch a video online. They have shown they can use these resources to take effective notes and keep these notes in a form that will last the duration of their studies.

Task.Title: Take note
Task.Body: Upload a scan image or link to a Google Doc of some well-presented notes you have made independently. You should include a reference to the learning resource you used during your independent learning. For example, this could be a link to a YouTube video you watched or blog post you read.Ideally, this will be in addition to any work set by your teachers.
